name: Alchemist's Cafe
description:
This world doesn't need a hero. It needs a good cup of tea!

Prepare and brew beverages for your adventurous clients in this little cafe simulator set in a fantasy world.
If that's your first day on the job, check out the white board for tips!

Some assets are from Magic Market by GFragger
Background music from ChillMindscapes' Music Pack 4

Inspirations
  • Game "an average day at the cat cafe" by angela he
  • Game "Potion Craft: Alchemist Simulator" by niceplay games
